News.Title: Lakshya Powertech Secures 79 Crore Rupee Contract
News.Summary: Lakshya Powertech has secured a contract worth 79 crore rupees. The company has a market capitalization of 125 crore rupees.

News.Title: Lakshya Powertech Secures ₹48.64 Crore CNG Services Contract from Oil India Limited
News.Summary: Lakshya Powertech has received a ₹48.64 crore order from Oil India Limited for CNG services. The contract will be executed over a 7-year period using the Build-Own-Operate (BOO) model.

News.Title: Lakshya Powertech Secures 5 Crore Rupee Order
News.Summary: Lakshya Powertech, a small and medium enterprise (SME) with a market capitalization of 180 crore rupees, has won a new order worth 5 crore rupees.

News.Title: Lakshya Powertech Secures Orders Worth ₹14 Crore
News.Summary: Lakshya Powertech, a company with a market capitalization of ₹200 crore, has won two orders totaling ₹14 crore. These orders are to be completed within a four-month timeframe. The company is classified as a Small and Medium Enterprise (SME).

News.Title: Lakshya Powertech Secures 2.80 Crore Rupee Order
News.Summary: Lakshya Powertech, a company with a market capitalization of 290 crore rupees, has won a new order worth 2.80 crore rupees. This development is significant for the small and medium enterprise (SME) sector.

News.Title: Lakshya Powertech: Stellar 90% Premium on NSE SME Debut
News.Summary: Lakshya Powertech shares opened at ₹342 on NSE SME, a 90% premium over the issue price of ₹180.
